name: Aravindh Manavalan
label: Analytics Engineer & Data Scientist
summary: Analytics Engineer and Data Scientist with 4+ years of experience at McKinsey & Company, currently pursuing Master's in Data Science at University of Washington. Specialized in building AI-powered analytics solutions, data pipelines, and automation tools that drive business impact. Proven track record of leading data modernization initiatives and developing innovative solutions from computer vision systems to LLM-based applications.

work_experience.summary: Leading AI and data modernization initiatives for Product & Pricing Strategy team
highlights: Developed a text-to-SQL AI Agent for Lucid's Product & Pricing Strategy team to enable 10+ leadership stakeholders to access ad-hoc insights independently

Led data modernization initiative for product marketing, partnering with enterprise DE to develop data pipelines & dashboards for replacing Excel-dependent workflows with scalable analytics infrastructure

work_experience.summary: Led analytics initiatives and product development across multiple client engagements
highlights: Led development of tech talent survey analytics pipeline as Product Lead, designing KNIME ETL workflows and Tableau dashboards that identified skill gaps across 20+ client projects
Automated client report generation using custom Python application, reducing delivery time by over 90%
Prototyped project planning tool using Mixed Integer Programming optimization model, deployed in 5 McKinsey RTS studies
Mentored 2 junior analysts through their career progression from interns to analysts

work_experience.summary: Specialized in database management and IT service optimization analytics
highlights: Spearheaded database setup and ETL pipeline revamp for ITSM datasets, improving client productivity through KPIs and statistical analysis in 10+ transformations
Served as Digital Consultant on IT cost optimization through 'Ignite' diagnostic product, generating over $50K in billable time

work_experience.summary: Focused on automation and business analysis for internal applications
highlights: Automated ITSM analysis with Alteryx workflows, achieving 80% reduction in turnaround time, enabled 50% cost savings compared to Excel model
Acted as business analyst for an internal web application, worked with diverse stakeholders to gather requirements and lead UAT sessions

projects.title: Automated Vaux's Swift Counter
projects.summary: Computer Vision system for wildlife conservation using advanced AI models
highlights: Developed a multi-stage CV system integrating YOLOv11, SAM2 segmentation, and custom trajectory tracking
Built for the Courtenay Museum's Vaux's Swift conservation project
Achieved over 90% accuracy for low and medium traffic scenarios
Combines object detection, segmentation, and tracking for real-time bird counting

projects.title: SteamViz
projects.summary: Comprehensive data visualization dashboard analyzing Steam gaming market trends
highlights: Built comprehensive data pipelines and Tableau dashboard analyzing Steam's top 100 games
Uncovered market trends and player behavior patterns
Interactive visualizations for game performance metrics
Data-driven insights into gaming industry dynamics

projects.title: Quizzatron
projects.summary: AI-powered educational application for automated quiz generation
highlights: Created an LLM-based quiz generation web application
Transforms prompts/PDFs into interactive assessments
Powered by Google Gemini models for natural language processing
Streamlined educational content creation process

degrees: Master of Science in Data Science
Bachelor of Science in Electrical Engineering

interests.name: AI & Machine Learning Research
interests.summary: Passionate about advancing AI applications in real-world scenarios, particularly in computer vision and natural language processing. Currently exploring agentic AI systems and their applications in business analytics.

interests.name: Data Science Innovation
interests.summary: Enthusiastic about developing innovative data science solutions that bridge the gap between complex analytics and practical business applications. Enjoys working on projects that combine technical depth with real-world impact.

references.name: Available upon request
references.reference: Professional references from McKinsey & Company colleagues and academic advisors are available upon request.
